activities: Employment Background Investigations, Inc. (EBI) is a consumer reporting agency that collects personal data for the purposes of providing its clients with the necessary information required to make informed employment screening decisions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: National Association of Professional Background Screeners (NAPBS)
recoursemech: EBI complies with all applicable local, federal and host nation laws regarding the release of information- including the Fair Credit Reporting Act and the European Data Protection Directive. EBI agrees to cooperate with EU Data Protection authorities to investigate any unresolved complaints.
